text: "The Power of Love" is a song written and recorded by American singer- songwriter Jennifer Rush in 1984. It was later covered by Laura Branigan, Air Supply and Celine Dion. Rush's version hit #1 in the United Kingdom. However, it only peaked at #57 in the United States. Dion's version hit #1 in the United States, Canada and Australia in 1994. The song then became a pop standard. It won an ASCAP Pop Award for Most Performed Song in the United States. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:Celine Dion songs Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Air Supply songs Category:Laura Branigan songs
title: The Power of Love (song)
